Text: ive downloaded it so now how do i play it?

http://dfendreloaded.sourceforge.net/Download.html

use this program paired with dosbox. D-fend makes dosbox run the program (commander keen) without having to type in command line every time. The instructions can be googled.

this is one of the most poorly constructed torrents i have ever seen in my life, and the poster should feel bad. 


seriously, to anyone reading this, don't even bother.  the tard who uploaded this botched the directories.  you pretty much have to rename EVERYTHING to get it to run in dos.  and on top of that he bloated it with so much of his on self-advertising bullshit he deserves to have his balls chopped off.
I downloaded it, opened the zip-file and clicked on the "KEEN1" file (for game 1, KEEN2 for game 2 etc), and the game started! No problems, I don't need to use dosbox
